resources.string: GisApp needs access to your location information. Activate GPS, please.
GisApp needs access to the internet. Activate mobile network or Wifi, please.
GisApp needs the Google Play Services to localize the user. The app will be closing now.
Problem adding taken photo to the queue. Retake the photo, please.
Problem creating photo file. Retake the photo, please.
An unknown error occurred while trying to get Google\'s authentication token.
You need to pick an account.
You have to take at least one photo of the POI before sending the data.
Google Play services are mandatory. The app closes, because it is missing.
The backend server could not be contacted.
An error occurred while sending the data.
The Google authorization token expired. The app is requesting a new one.
